Text.Name: SuperPart_Bear_1
Text.Desc: A secret body passed down from the bloodline of ancient bear Yaoguai that uses energy to remold the heart and Lungs. Once achieved, it can generate True Qi continuously.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body True Qi recovery rate.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body True Qi recovery rate.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Increases the secret body True Qi recovery rate by a huge amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Bear_2
Text.Desc: A secret body passed down from the bloodline of ancient bear Yaoguai that uses the Force of Destruction in Heavenly Tribulations to remold the claws. So powerful that it can annihilate everything.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a huge amount.
